original_title: Sawano Hiroyuki Live[nZk]003 Exclusive Live Broadcast (NicoNico 2015)
overview: 2015/09/12 (Sat) 17:50 Open 18:00 Start  Hiroyuki Sawano's one-man live exclusive live broadcast has been decided!  "Attack on Titan" "Mobile Suit Gundam UC" "Aldnoah.Zero" etc. Worked on the soundtrack for the blockbuster anime work, Recently, the NHK serial TV novel "Rare" Hiroyuki Sawano, a popular film composer who also works on gekitomo music.  On September 9th (Wednesday), the soundtrack best "BEST OF SOUNDTRACK [emU]" New project Sawano Hiroyuki [nZk] 1st album To commemorate the simultaneous release of "o1" Hiroyuki Sawano's rare one-man live "Hiroyuki Sawano Live [nZk] 003" It has been decided to broadcast exclusively live on NicoNico Live!  Remarks: to keep the file original, i did not edit anything and the show starts from the 49th minute.
title: Sawano Hiroyuki Live[nZk]003 Exclusive Live Broadcast (NicoNico 2015)
